articles.headline: Warriors' Jimmy Butler ruled out vs. Suns with sore lower back
articles.description: Warriors forward Jimmy Butler, who was dealing with a sore lower back coming into Tuesday's game against the Suns, played just 14 first-half minutes and was ruled out in the third quarter.

images.alt: Warriors' Jimmy Butler ruled out vs. Suns with sore lower back

articles.headline: Hawks roll to 127-112 victory over the Magic
articles.description: — Zaccharie Risacher scored 21 points, Nickeil Alexander-Walker had 20 and the Atlanta Hawks beat the Orlando Magic 127-112 on Tuesday night.

images.alt: Hawks roll to 127-112 victory over the Magic
